Introduction Edited by: Akki Team

Codearc is a CSS and Javascript library. This means it provides CSS classes and javacript functionality to made a powerful project.

To use Bulma, you can either:

  • use one of the pre-compiled .css and .js files

Code Requirement

For Codearc to work correctly, you need to make your webpage responsive.

1 Use the HTML5 doctype

<!DOCTYPE html>
